people.name: Scoobert "Scooby" Doo
people.bio: The Great Dane mascot of Mystery Inc., and pet and best friend of Shaggy Rogers.

people.name: Norville "Shaggy" Rogers
people.bio: A member of Mystery Inc., and the owner and best friend of their team's mascot: Scooby-Doo, a talking Great Dane.

people.name: Fred "Freddie/Freddy" Jones
people.bio: The leader of the Mystery Inc. gang, and (more often than not) the driver of their van: The Mystery Machine.
